DOC.criteria: Participants must 18 65 year age . Provide write Informed Consent . Must wear plan replacement soft lens 2 week monthly replacement modality , Rigid Gas Permeable ( RGP ) contact Lens Must best correct distance visual acuity , contact lens , 20/30 good eye . Must available study visit fill study questionnaire . Has modify systemic medication within 30 day prior enrollment .
